settings.heading: Authentic Streetwear Culture
settings.description:
Born from the streets and inspired by urban culture, we create authentic streetwear that represents the voice of a generation. Our designs blend comfort, style, and self-expression.

Every piece tells a story, every design has purpose, and every collection represents our commitment to quality and authenticity.
settings.values_description: The principles that guide everything we do.

settings.title: Quality First
settings.description: Premium materials and construction in every piece we create.
settings.icon_svg: <svg width="60" height="60" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none"><path d="M12 2L15.09 8.26L22 9L17 14L18.18 21L12 17.77L5.82 21L7 14L2 9L8.91 8.26L12 2Z" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/></svg>

settings.title: Street Authenticity
settings.description: Designs rooted in real street culture and urban experiences.

settings.title: Community Driven
settings.description: Built by and for the streetwear community that inspires us daily.
